subroutines.narration: All Constants and Functions are initialised
Delta coverage is multiplied against effect size
Total Prevalence reductions are subtracted from 1
Copy baseline prevalence to current prevalence
Subtract 1 from relative risks for excess risk
Modify RF_All by Paf deltas and consumption impacts
Generate the base values of the surrogate nodes
Generate the base values of the function nodes for constants
Generate the values of the constants
Modify Combined DW with intervention effects
Calculate Mortality Surrogate (Add CFR to Surrogate)
Modify Population Reached by PIN and Coverage
